quote: of being strong and brave. The strong can not be brave. Only the weak can be brave; and yet again, in practice, only those who can be brave can be trusted, in time of doubt, to be strong.
quote_letters: OF BEING STRONG AND BRAVE THE STRONG CAN NOT BE BRAVE ONLY THE WEAK CAN BE BRAVE AND YET AGAIN IN PRACTICE ONLY THOSE WHO CAN BE BRAVE CAN BE TRUSTED IN TIME OF DOUBT TO BE STRONG
